import"core-js/modules/es.promise.js";import{createObservableDataAction}from'@msdyn365-commerce/core';import{buildCacheKey}from'.';import{getSearchConfigurationAsync}from'@msdyn365-commerce/retail-proxy/dist/DataActions/StoreOperationsDataActions.g';/**
 * Action Input class for the getSearchConfiguration data action
 */export class SearchConfigurationInput{constructor(apiSettings){this.getCacheKey=()=>buildCacheKey('SearchConfig',this.apiSettings);this.getCacheObjectType=()=>'SearchConfiguration';this.dataCacheType=()=>'request';this.apiSettings=apiSettings;}}/**
 * Creates the input required to make the retail api call
 */export const createSearchConfigurationInput=inputData=>{return new SearchConfigurationInput(inputData.requestContext.apiSettings);};/**
 * Calls the Retail API
 */export async function getSearchConfigurationAction(input,ctx){return getSearchConfigurationAsync({callerContext:ctx});}export default createObservableDataAction({id:'@msdyn365-commerce-modules/retail-actions/get-search-configurations',action:getSearchConfigurationAction,input:createSearchConfigurationInput});
